name: woocommerce-automation
description: Automation test scripts for woocommerce using cypress

scripts.report: npx cypress run --spec ./cypress/e2e/regression/*.js --browser chrome --reporter mocha-allure-reporter --env allure=true
scripts.generate-allure-report: allure generate allure-results  --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.final-allure-report: npm run report && npm run generate-allure-report

author: Saurabh
